decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-B-1017-S01 (LOCATION AND SITE PLAN); 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-5017-S01 (WINDOW AND DOOR TYPES SCHEDULE); 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2701-S01 (PROPOSED NORTH ELEVATION); 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2702-S01 (PROPOSED EAST ELEVATION); 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2703-S01 (PROPOSED SOUTH ELEVATION); 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2704-S01 (PROPOSED WEST ELEVATION); DESIGN & ACCESS STATEMENT (JCW/4351 MARCH 2023).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Replacement of existing single-glazed aluminium windows (including communal windows with the exception of the steel communal windows above the main entrances) with double-glazed UPVC casement windows (Joint Application by London Borough of Ealing - Regulation 3)
